name: NetImage Distributed database
short_description:
NetImage Distributed Network Database 

Due to some specific activities a lot of search queires may be required. 
Popular search engines is really great for that although 
they do have some limitations. 
For example once you will do more than 100 searches in one hour 
you may get captcha. 

What if create distributed database that anybody may fill. It will contain 
some different data on demand. 

Early version will be rather simple just domain name and some fist 
1000 chars of home page text. 

At the moment software in development that will connect to torrent 
tracker, read peers list and synchronize database among them, it may take up to few 
months to make it public. Any given peer do not have to keep all the data. 

This software will also do search on this database. 
Later more fields and size of data may be added. 

Once you feel having some time to add more data to database please do.
summary: NetImage Distributed database using torrent protocol as data pipe
